hue_enabled.title: Hue Hub: Enabled
hue_enabled.details: Whether the Hue lights are present

ip_hub.title: Hue Hub: Hostname
ip_hub.details: IP of the Hue Hub used to control the lights

api_key.title: Hue Hub: API Key
api_key.details: Secret API key used to communicate with the Hue Hub

light_nbr.title: Hue Hub: Number of lightbulbs
light_nbr.details: Number of lightbuls in the robotarium

ip_cam.title: IP Cameras: Cameras' hostnames
ip_cam.details: A comma-separated list of cameras' hostnames (or IPs)

changelog_file.title: Changelog file
changelog_file.details: Location of changelog file for Duckiebots

registry_hostname.title: Docker: Local registry hostname
registry_hostname.details: Hostname of the Docker registry used for local submissions

logging_server_username.title: Username of the logging server, needs passwordless ssh
logging_server_username.details: Username of the logging server, needs passwordless ssh

ip_rosmaster.title: IP of the lab ROS master
ip_rosmaster.details: IP of the lab ROS master

duckietown_world_fork.title: Town: Duckietown World fork
duckietown_world_fork.details: Name of the duckietown-world repository fork to use (e.g., 'duckietown-ttic' if the repository 'duckietown-ttic/duckietown-world' exists)

map_name.title: Town: Map name
map_name.details: Name of the map to use (from the selected duckietown-world fork)
